xml:
Gastro-resistant granules
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Label 25 - Swallow this medicine whole. Do not chew or crush

Granupas gastro-resistant granules 4g sachets <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Lucane Pharma Ltd)</ph> 26396411000001105

Aminosalicylic acid 1 gram per 1 gram

  • 30 sachet POM

    NHS indicative price = £331.00

AMINOSALICYLIC ACID
